item.title: About me
item.description:
HelloÔºÅ üëã

I’m Nanxuan Li, and this is my little corner of the internet where I share thoughts, projects, and things I find interesting.

Who Am I

I’m a developer who loves building things with code. By day, I work on software that aims to make life a bit easier; by night, I’m either learning a new framework, analyzing market trends, or getting lost in a virtual world. I believe in continuous learning and the power of technology to create positive change.
